original: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa kho na spyod pa'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang / sems can grol bas zad par mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis de dag la brten pa'i bsod nams kyang zad par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa kho na spyod pa'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang / sems can grol bas zad par mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis de dag la brten pa'i bsod nams kyang zad par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The purity of the bodhisattva's thought is the principal thing in the practice, and the merit based on it is not exhausted because of the inexhaustibility of the liberation of sentient beings. This is shown by

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Just as... and so on.

original: shes rab kyis khyad par du 'phags pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyis khyad par du 'phags pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The superiority of wisdom is shown by

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The accumulation of the thought of enlightenment... and so on.

original: tshogs zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyis stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: tshogs zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyis stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs so //
translated: Accumulation is the accumulation of the wisdom of the intuition which has emptiness as its object.

original: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i sems so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i sems so //
translated: The thought of enlightenment is the ultimate thought.

original: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje'o //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje'o //
translated: The lineage of the Three Jewels is emptiness and compassion.

original: mi 'chad pa ni mngon par sangs rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: mi 'chad pa ni mngon par sangs rgyas pa ste /
translated: Not interrupted means fully enlightened.

original: mngon par sangs rgyas na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: mngon par sangs rgyas na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: When fully enlightened, one turns the wheel of the Dharma.

original: de bskor na 'phags pa'i ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bskor na 'phags pa'i ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is turned, the gnosis of the noble ones will arise.üîΩIf that arises, one will fully awaken to buddhahood.

original: de byung na mngon @239b bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes 'khor lo'i tshul du 'byung bas na mi 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: de byung na mngon @239b bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes 'khor lo'i tshul du 'byung bas na mi 'chad pa'o //
translated: Since it arises in the manner of a wheel, it is uninterrupted.

original: la la na re rigs ni bden pa la sogs pa brten gzhi la bya'o zhas zer ro //
analyzed: la la na re rigs ni bden pa la sogs pa brten gzhi la bya'o zhas zer ro //
translated: Some say the lineage is the basis for the truths and so on.

original: la lan re mthong ba'i lam gyi bden pa bzhis bsdus pas sa dang po la 'jug par bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: la lan re mthong ba'i lam gyi bden pa bzhis bsdus pas sa dang po la 'jug par bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say it is the four truths subsumed by the path of seeing, and one should enter the first bhumi.

original: la la na re pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: la la na re pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say it is the six perfections.

original: la la na re thabs dang shes rab yin te /
analyzed: la la na re thabs dang shes rab yin te /
translated: Some say it is method and prajna.

original: thabs la mkhas pa ni pha yin la /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa ni pha yin la /
translated: Skill in method is the father,

original: shes rab ma yin pas de las skyes pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: shes rab ma yin pas de las skyes pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: and since prajna is the mother, it is born from that.

original: la la na re sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab pa la bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: la la na re sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab pa la bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say it is the training prescribed by the Buddha.

original: la la na re da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying rje chen po yin no zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: la la na re da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying rje chen po yin no zhes 'dod do //
translated: Some say that it is the samadhi of the present Buddha's manifestation and great compassion.

original: la la ni smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems la bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: la la ni smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems la bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that it is the aspiration and engagement mind.

original: de ltar rgyas par bshad nas phan yon mtha' dag bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar rgyas par bshad nas phan yon mtha' dag bsdu ba ni /
translated: Having thus explained in detail, the summary of all benefits is stated:

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi bsod nams gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi bsod nams gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: What is the merit of the thought of enlightenment?

original: la la dag ni smon pa dang 'jug pa'i phan yon bsdu ba yin no zhes 'dod do //üîΩla la dag ni 'jug pa'i phan yon bsdu bar 'dod do //
analyzed: la la dag ni smon pa dang 'jug pa'i phan yon bsdu ba yin no zhes 'dod do // la la dag ni 'jug pa'i phan yon bsdu bar 'dod do //
translated: Some assert that it is the summary of the benefits of aspiration and engagement.üîΩSome assert that it is the summary of the benefits of engagement.

original: la la dag ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i phan yon bsdu bar 'dod do //
analyzed: la la dag ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i phan yon bsdu bar 'dod do //
translated: Some assert that it is the summary of the benefits of perfect application.

original: la la dag ni de dag nges don gyi shes byed du 'chad do //
analyzed: la la dag ni de dag nges don gyi shes byed du 'chad do //
translated: Some explain that they are the proofs of definitive meaning.

original: da ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid bstan par bya ste /
translated: Now, the essence of the thought of enlightenment should be taught.

original: 'dir ngo bo nyid ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa yul khyad par can du 'phags pa la dmigs pa zad pa med pa 'dren par nus pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ngo bo nyid ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa yul khyad par can du 'phags pa la dmigs pa zad pa med pa 'dren par nus pa ste /
translated: Here, the nature of mind is the mental consciousness that is able to induce the inexhaustible noble focus on special objects.

original: yul ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje'o //
analyzed: yul ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje'o //
translated: The objects are emptiness and compassion.

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bsgribs pa lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni dri ma can gyi 'khor bzhi dang rtag tu ldan pa'i phyir dang / sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa dag ni /
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bsgribs pa lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni dri ma can gyi 'khor bzhi dang rtag tu ldan pa'i phyir dang / sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa dag ni /
translated: The consciousness of the ground of all is unobscured and neutral, the afflicted mind is always associated with the four defiled heaps, and the five sense consciousnesses are unstable.üîΩTherefore, only the mental consciousness is mentioned.

original: brtan pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig smos te /üîΩspro ba che dang rtsom pa che //
analyzed: brtan pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig smos te / spro ba che dang rtsom pa che //
translated: It is said:üîΩIt is expansive, it is a great undertaking,

original: don che ba dang 'byung ba che //
analyzed: don che ba dang 'byung ba che //
translated: it has a great aim, it is a great occurrence.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
translated: The bodhisattva is a great being.

original: don gnyis ldan pa'i sems 'byung ba //üîΩzhes bshad do //üîΩgang gis khyad par du 'phags /
analyzed: don gnyis ldan pa'i sems 'byung ba // zhes bshad do // gang gis khyad par du 'phags /
translated: The mind that possesses two aims arises.üîΩBy what is it distinguished?

original: gang las khyad par 'phags she na /
analyzed: gang las khyad par 'phags she na /
translated: From what is it distinguished?

original: shes rab dang snying rje so so'i skye bo dang nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba'i sems las khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang snying rje so so'i skye bo dang nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba'i sems las khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
translated: Wisdom and compassion are superior to the minds of ordinary beings, ≈õrƒÅvakas, and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de bstan pa chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bstan pa chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The teaching on that is stated in the S≈´tra on Chanting the Dharma Together, and so forth.

original: chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dkar po'i chos mtha' dag go //
analyzed: chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dkar po'i chos mtha' dag go //
translated: All phenomena refers to all virtuous phenomena.

original: de las 'byung bas @240a * //
analyzed: de las 'byung bas @240a * //
translated: Because they arise from that,

original: na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: they are called that.

original: de la shes rab kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pas na /
analyzed: de la shes rab kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pas na /
translated: Regarding that, because wisdom realizes that all phenomena are emptiness,

original: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: it is equal to the dharmadhƒÅtu, and so forth.

original: kun rdzob gzhi med pa la dmigs pas na /
analyzed: kun rdzob gzhi med pa la dmigs pas na /
translated: Because it focuses on the groundless conventional,

original: ye shes stong pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes stong pa'o //
translated: wisdom is empty.

original: 'khrul pa'i rgyu las byung bas na glo bur ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rgyu las byung bas na glo bur ba'o //
translated: Because it arises from the cause of error, it is adventitious.

original: slu bas na gnas pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: slu bas na gnas pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Because it deceives, it is not a stable state.

original: rtag tu mi rung bas na yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu mi rung bas na yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: Because it is always unsuitable, it is not to be fully understood.

original: de lta bu'i 'khrul pa spangs pa stong pa nyid gzhan la bstan pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'khrul pa spangs pa stong pa nyid gzhan la bstan pa'i sgo nas /
translated: Thus, the teaching of compassion through the demonstration of emptiness, which is the abandonment of such error, is as follows.

original: snying rje bstan pa ni sems can dag kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje bstan pa ni sems can dag kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The teaching of compassion is expressed by the words ‚Äúsentient beings‚Äù and so forth.

original: gzhan dag ni chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid de nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu yin pas mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid de nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu yin pas mnyam pa'o //
translated: Others say that all phenomena are the same, because they are emptiness, like the center of space.

original: 'on kyang snang ba tsam mi 'gog cing skur pa mi 'debs bas shes par bya ba tsam mo //
analyzed: 'on kyang snang ba tsam mi 'gog cing skur pa mi 'debs bas shes par bya ba tsam mo //
translated: However, mere appearance is not refuted, nor is it denied, so it is merely to be known.

original: 'khrul ba dang bral bas ye shes stong pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrul ba dang bral bas ye shes stong pa'o //
translated: Since it is free from error, it is empty pristine wisdom.

original: 'o na ye shes kyi yul ni kun rdzob yin pas ji ltar gnas shes na /
analyzed: 'o na ye shes kyi yul ni kun rdzob yin pas ji ltar gnas shes na /
translated: Well, if the object of pristine wisdom is the conventional, how does it abide?

original: glo bur byung ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: glo bur byung ba zhes bya ste /
translated: It is said to be adventitious,

original: ma rig pa brtags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma rig pa brtags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because ignorance is imputed.

original: chos nyid dngos la mi brten pas gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos nyid dngos la mi brten pas gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it does not rely on the actual reality of phenomena, it does not abide.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma yin pas yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes 'dod de /
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma yin pas yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes 'dod de /
translated: Since it is not the object of direct perception or inference, it is not to be fully known.

original: de la snying rje dang ldan pas sems cad la dmigs pa nyan thos la sogs pa las khyad par du 'phags pa ni /
analyzed: de la snying rje dang ldan pas sems cad la dmigs pa nyan thos la sogs pa las khyad par du 'phags pa ni /
translated: Compassion is superior to the disciples, etc., in that it focuses on sentient beings.

original: phan pa dang bde ba'i sems so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phan pa dang bde ba'i sems so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The thought of benefit and happiness is the thought of benefit and happiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyis dngos por lta ba las khyad par du 'phags pas na stong pa nyid kyis mi 'gyur ba'i sems la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis dngos por lta ba las khyad par du 'phags pas na stong pa nyid kyis mi 'gyur ba'i sems la sogs pa'o //
translated: The thought of emptiness is superior to the view of substantialism by means of emptiness.

original: da ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rang bzhin brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rang bzhin brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to state the nature of the generation of the Thought of Enlightenment, he says,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having thoroughly resolved upon omniscience, etc.

original: rang bzhin ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rang bzhin ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Nature is twofold:

original: byang chub tu sems smon pa dang / de'i rgyu la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub tu sems smon pa dang / de'i rgyu la 'jug pa'o //
translated: the aspiration to enlightenment and the engagement in its cause.

original: de'i phyir dang po smon pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rang bzhin brjod pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dang po smon pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rang bzhin brjod pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: Therefore, the nature of the first, the generation of the aspirational thought, is stated by having thoroughly resolved upon omniscience, etc.,

original: smon pa ni smon lam yin pa'i phyir yongs su bsngos  pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: smon pa ni smon lam yin pa'i phyir yongs su bsngos  pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The vow is called the dedication because it is the vow.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi don byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi don byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one formulates the vow: ‚ÄúMay I become a perfect Buddha and work for the benefit of all beings.‚Äù

original: byang chub kyi snying po ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying po ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The essence of enlightenment is twofold:

original: gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang / rtogs pa byang chub kyi snying po'o //
analyzed: gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang / rtogs pa byang chub kyi snying po'o //
translated: the essence of enlightenment as a place and the essence of enlightenment as a realization.

original: 'dir @240b ni gnas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dod do //
analyzed: 'dir @240b ni gnas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dod do //
translated: Here, the essence of enlightenment as a place is intended.

original: mi dang lha'i 'bras bu dang / nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dag ni bar ma do'o //
analyzed: mi dang lha'i 'bras bu dang / nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dag ni bar ma do'o //
translated: The fruits of human and divine rebirths and the fruits of the disciples and the hermit buddhas are the intermediate stages.

original: 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya ste /
translated: The following should be stated:

original: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rgyu ni gang /üîΩrkyen ni gang /
analyzed: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rgyu ni gang / rkyen ni gang /
translated: What is the cause of generating the thought of enlightenment?üîΩWhat is the condition?

original: khas len pa ni gang /üîΩmi nyams pa ni gang /
analyzed: khas len pa ni gang / mi nyams pa ni gang /
translated: What is the vow?üîΩWhat is the non-loss of the vow?

original: nyams pa ni gang /
analyzed: nyams pa ni gang /
translated: What is the loss of the vow?

original: nyams pa rjes su gso ba ni gang zhe na /
analyzed: nyams pa rjes su gso ba ni gang zhe na /
translated: What is the restoration of the vow when it is lost?

original: rgyu ni rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: rgyu ni rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: The cause is fivefold:

original: tshad med pa goms pa sems can gyi sdug bsngal mthong ba dang / skyabs su song bas bdag nyid shes pa dang / tshogs bsags pas rgyud rnam par dag pa dang / rten mngon du gyur pas rgyud dang bar gyur pa dang / snying rje goms pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa goms pa sems can gyi sdug bsngal mthong ba dang / skyabs su song bas bdag nyid shes pa dang / tshogs bsags pas rgyud rnam par dag pa dang / rten mngon du gyur pas rgyud dang bar gyur pa dang / snying rje goms pa'o //
translated: The cause of the generation of the Thought is the cultivation of the immeasurables, seeing the suffering of sentient beings, going for refuge, knowing oneself, purifying the mental continuum by accumulating the collections, making the mental continuum fit by actualizing the support, and cultivating compassion.

original: rkyen ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dbang du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rkyen ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dbang du gyur pa'o //
translated: The condition is being under the influence of a spiritual friend.

original: khas len pa ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas dngos gzhi la smon lam 'debs shing rjes su gdams ngag sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: khas len pa ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas dngos gzhi la smon lam 'debs shing rjes su gdams ngag sbyin pa'o //
translated: The vow is the perfection of the application, the aspiration for the actual practice, and the gift of the subsequent instructions.

original: mi nyams pa ni byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa rnams te /
analyzed: mi nyams pa ni byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa rnams te /
translated: The non-degeneration is the cultivation of the Thought of Enlightenment and so forth as previously explained.

original: nyams pa ni sngar bshad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nyams pa ni sngar bshad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'o //
translated: The degeneration is the occurrence of the adverse factors as previously explained.

original: nyams pa rjes su gso ba ni nyams pa las phyir 'chos pa ste /
analyzed: nyams pa rjes su gso ba ni nyams pa las phyir 'chos pa ste /
translated: The restoration of the degeneration is the amendment of the degeneration.

original: de ltar na re zhig smon pa'i sems su rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig smon pa'i sems su rig par bya ste /
translated: Thus, one should understand the Thought of Aspiration.

original: tshad med pa ni btang snyoms pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa ni btang snyoms pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba'o //
translated: The immeasurables are equanimity, love, compassion, and joy.

original: de la dang por btang snyoms bsgom bar bya ste /
analyzed: de la dang por btang snyoms bsgom bar bya ste /
translated: Among them, one should first cultivate equanimity,

original: sa gzhi dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa gzhi dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is like the ground.üîΩAfter that, one should cultivate love,

original: de'i rjes la byams pa ni gser dang 'dra bas so //üîΩsnying rje ni sa bon dang 'dra bas so //
analyzed: de'i rjes la byams pa ni gser dang 'dra bas so // snying rje ni sa bon dang 'dra bas so //
translated: because it is like gold.üîΩOne should cultivate compassion,üîΩbecause it is like a seed.üîΩOne should cultivate joy,

original: dga' ba ni ngo sel ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni ngo sel ba lta bu'o //
translated: because it is like a friend.

original: ji ltar goms par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar goms par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one cultivate them?

original: rten gyi gang zag dbang po rtul pos rim can du goms pa dang / 'bring gos 'bring du dang / dbang po rnon pos cig car du goms par byas pa'o //
analyzed: rten gyi gang zag dbang po rtul pos rim can du goms pa dang / 'bring gos 'bring du dang / dbang po rnon pos cig car du goms par byas pa'o //
translated: The person of dull faculties should cultivate them gradually, the person of medium faculties should cultivate them in the middle way, and the person of sharp faculties should cultivate them all at once.

original: des rang dang gzhan mnyam par gyur ba dang / gzhan gces par gyur pa ni de'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: des rang dang gzhan mnyam par gyur ba dang / gzhan gces par gyur pa ni de'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The cause of that is the equality of self and other, and the cherishing of others.

original: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la de nyid thob par 'dod bas skyabs su 'gro zhing skyabs kyi mi nyams pa'i chos rnams rjes su sgrub pa yang rgyu gnyis te ji skad du //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la de nyid thob par 'dod bas skyabs su 'gro zhing skyabs kyi mi nyams pa'i chos rnams rjes su sgrub pa yang rgyu gnyis te ji skad du //
